title: Snowdown
body: with christmas around the corner and maybe new snowdown skins will riot release snowdown/christmas chests/caches?

replies.body:
There are 3 new skins currently on the PBE. And Riot is planning to "cover the rift in snow".

Santa Braum, Snowday Graves and Winter Karma.

Well done Riot. I will be buying 2 of those.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/11/1121-pbe-update.html#newskins
lol of course its all release the day after i post ty for the reply
